message.body: Hello! I miss you! How ya been?
I know! Me too! I've been good. Just working. Me and Michael bought a kiddie pool and are sitting out right now. Haha. You? How's class? Is Mike still here?

Hahahaha. You're sitting out in a kiddie pool. That's funny! I've been good. I really like the babysitting job I have. So much free time! But my class is actually finished! I finished on Wednesday and mike left yesterday night. His flight leaves at like 7 tonight. But I can't wait till we get to do something again!
Good. We can all do something for July 4th.
I can't believe Mike is going again! He must be excited though.
Yes! I like it! He is excited again, but thankfully he claims that after this trip, he won't want to go again for a long time. Which will be nice. Maybe we'll FINALLY have a summer together. Haha.
Well that would be nice. So we're definitely good to hang out next weekend! Finally!
Oh good! Can't wait to see everyone again!
